mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REPORT ( REPORT_ID, REPORT_TARGET_TYPE, REPORT_TARGET_ID, USER_ID, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID ) VALUES ( #{reportId}, #{reportTargetType}, #{reportTargetId}, #{userId}, #{reportReason}, SYSDATE, 'PENDING', SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_ID AS reportId, REPORT_TARGET_TYPE AS reportTargetType, REPORT_TARGET_ID AS reportTargetId, USER_ID AS userId, REPORT_REASON AS reportReason, REPORT_DATE AS reportDate, REPORT_STATUS AS reportStatus, CREATE_ID AS createId, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate, UPDATED_ID AS updatedId FROM TB_REPORT ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC
